Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which I believe has the potential to significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your organization. Given its unique features and capabilities, I firmly believe its worth exceeds $1200000 to us. We are offering this exceptional product to you at an exclusive price of $1500000. This offer includes comprehensive support and customization services tailored to meet your specific needs. Please consider this investment as a strategic move towards achieving your business goals with unparalleled efficiency and effectiveness. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me directly. I look forward to discussing how this product can revolutionize your operations. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,500,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,500,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
